resources.string: Welcome, the search is about to begin. Be aware of the indications of the game, only this way you will be able to find the lost Intent.
The user must have a length between %1$d and %2$d characters.
Well %1$s, there is no turning back now. Now all you need is your courage and common sense to help you find the Intent we are looking for.
Well, it seems you have not chosen the right path. Please call this number for help
Congratulations! You have found the Intent. Just click to see it
You require a key to open the door
You are still without the key
You\'ve got a key. You can open the door
You have chosen the right path %1$s, you are already very close to the lost Intent. Open the door to check it.
